snippet.title: Solomon Islanders in dark over development fund spending
snippet.content: A survey by Transparency International has found that most Solomon Islanders know little or nothing about the Constituency Development Fund, which makes payments to MPs to spend on projects in their constituencies. Journalist Georgina Kekea tells Bindi Bryce that Transparency's findings are not surprising when set against a background of a government that has made very little effort to keep the people informed.
